answerText: "The Bet" [or "Pari"][10] In this short story by the same author, Dmitri Gurov and Anna Sergeyevna carry out a secret affair after meeting in Yalta.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 1 | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This story begins at a party hosted by a banker, where two characters argue over whether life imprisonment or execution is preferable. For 10 points each: [10] Name this story in which a lawyer is offered two million rubles if he imprisons himself in a garden for fifteen years. Ultimately, he chooses to leave the garden just five minutes before the time is up.
